text: Agustín Alberto Balbuena (1 September 1945 – 9 March 2021) was an Argentine football striker. He won four Copa Libertadores and the Copa Intercontinental with Club Atlético Independiente. He also played for the national team in the 1970s. Balbuena died on 9 March 2021, aged 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Argentine footballers
title: Agustín Balbuena
